title: Charles Bukowski - Major Works (1969 - 2011)
description:
Novels:

1971 Post Office (pdf, epub)
1975 Factotum (pdf, epub)
1978 Women (fb2)
1982 Ham on Rye (mobi)
1989 Hollywood (mobi, pdf, fb2)
1994 Pulp (mobi, pdf, fb2)

----------

Poems:

1969 The Days Run Away Like Wild Horses Over the Hills (mobi)
1972 Mockingbird Wish Me Luck (mobi)
1974 Burning in Water, Drowning in Flame (mobi)
1977 Love Is a Dog from Hell (mobi)
1979 Play the Piano Drunk Like a Percussion Instrument Until the Fingers Begin to Bleed a Bit (mobi)
1982 Dangling in the Tournefortia (epub)
1984 War All the Time (epub)
1986 You Get So Alone at Times That It Just Makes Sense (mobi, epub)
1988 The Roominghouse Madrigals - Early Selected Poems, 1946-1966 (mobi, txt)
1990 Septuagenarian Stew: Stories & Poems (pdf, epub)
1992 The Last Night of the Earth Poems (mobi)
1994 Run with the Hunted (epub)
1996 Betting on the Muse: Poems and Stories (pdf, fb2)
1998 Bone Palace Ballet (epub)
1999 What Matters Most Is How Well You Walk Through the Fire (text)
2000 Open All Night (pdf, epub)
2001 The Night Torn Mad with Footsteps (pdf, epub)
2003 Sifting Through the Madness for the Word, the Line, the Way (epub)
2003 New Poems 1 (Sifting Through the Madness... Reissue) (epub)
2003 New Poems 2 (Sifting Through the Madness... Reissue) (epub)
2004 New Poems 3 (The Flash of Lightning Behind the Mountain Reissue) (epub)
2004 Poems (classic poetry series) (pdf)
2004 The Flash of Lightning Behind the Mountain (epub)
2007 The People Look Like Flowers at Last(pdf, epub)
2007 The Pleasures of the Damned (mobi)
2009 The Continual Condition (epub)

------------------------------------------

Short Stories:

Short Stories Collection (doc)
1969 Notes of A Dirty Old Man (epub)
1973 South of No North (pdf, mobi)
1983 Hot Water Music (epub)
1983 Tales of Ordinary Madness (epub)
1983 The Most Beautiful Woman in Town (epub)
2010 Absence of the Hero (Uncollected stories and essays, vol.2)
2011 More Notes of a Dirty Old Man (mobi)
2002 Bring Me Your Love

------------------------------------------

Nonfiction books:

1993 Screams from the Balcony: Selected Letters (mobi)
1995 Living on Luck: Selected Letters, vol. 2 (pdf, mobi)
1995 Shakespeare Never Did This (epub)
1998 The Captain Is Out to Lunch and the Sailors Have Taken Over the Ship (pdf, epub)
1999 Reach for the Sun - Selected Letters, vol.3 (epub)
2004 Selected Letters Volume 2 (1965-1970) (epub)

------------------------------------------

Screenplays:

1984 The Movie 'Barfly' (epub)

------------------------------------------

Thanks to the uploaders who contributed to this collection
